RADx-rad Colleagues,
As you know from announcements in recent All-Hands Meetings, RADx-rad DCC is making anti-racism training available to all consortium members.
Living for Liberation is a four-session course that provides participants with opportunities to excavate and examine the intersectionality of background, beliefs, bias and behavior, and equip them to engage in courageous conversations about race and identity.
The course will meet on Wednesdays across four weeks, from 8:00 AM – 9:30 AM (Pacific Time) starting on September 22.

If you would like to participate, please fill out the registration form here: https://forms.gle/1E7A3xArnR7c2sA66
We look forward to receiving your response by this Friday August 20th so that we may continue to plan the course.

Class size is limited to the first 24 registrants.
